articles.author: Kevin Stankiewicz
articles.title: Dr. Scott Gottlieb estimates up to 1 million Americans infected with Covid daily as delta spreads - CNBC
articles.description: "I wouldn't be surprised if, on the whole, we're infecting up to a million people a day right now," Dr. Scott Gottlieb told CNBC on Friday.
articles.content: Dr. Scott Gottlieb told CNBC on Friday he believes the coronavirus is significantly more widespread in the U.S. than official case counts reflect as the highly contagious delta variant sweeps the nat… [+4022 chars]

articles.title: Afghan Visa Applicants Arrive in U.S. After Years of Waiting - The New York Times
articles.description: The first group of Afghan interpreters and others who helped Americans during the war will stay on an Army base in Virginia until they are resettled.
